column4: i got a sugestion by someone last night that i use http://hpisi.nerim.net/ for some of the debian packeges I've been loking for, could someone give me an idea of how that should be typed into the etc/apt/sources.list?
for my ubunto debian packeges that is
You should be using ftp://ftp.nerim.net/debian-marillat/ (there's a message saying so at the URL you posted).
